veforall-desc: A library for extensions to add VisualEditor
apihelp-veforall-parsoid-utils-summary: Convert text back and forth from Wikitext to HTML
apihelp-veforall-parsoid-utils-param-tit: title of the page holding the content
apihelp-veforall-parsoid-utils-param-pag: page ID of the page holding the content
veforall-api-error-unsupported-conversio: Conversion from '$1' to '$2' is not supported.
veforall-api-error-unsupported-parser-co: Conversion from '$1' to '$2' is not supported by the core parser.
veforall-api-error-parsoid-error: Request to $1 for $2 to $3 conversion of content connected to title $4 failed: $5
veforall-form-instances-not-minimized: Due to limitations in the software, some collapsed boxes had to be expanded before this form could be submitted. Please re-submit the form now.
